comments: The Greek letter 'pi' which transliterates as 'P' was used by accident on the cover of the 1984 Greek publication 'Biosyst. Meleti Genous Limonium'.  The authors actual initial is the greek letter 'rho' which transliterates as 'R'.
examples: Limonium damboldtianum D. Phitos & R. Artelari in Bot. Chronika, 1(1): 18 (1981).
